name: Cargo Statitics
query:
SELECT 
    tb.cargo_type AS 'Cargo Type',
    tb.work_type AS 'Work Type',
    tb.container_size AS 'Container Size',
    tb.container_content AS 'Container Content',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '1' THEN name
    END) Jan,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '2' THEN name
    END) Feb,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '3' THEN name
    END) Mar,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '4' THEN name
    END) Apr,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tb.eta_date) = '5' THEN name
    END) May
FROM
    tabCargo tb
WHERE
    tb.docstatus = 1
	AND tb.cargo_type not in ("Break Bulk")
        AND tb.manifest_check = 'Confirm'
        and tb.work_type is not null
GROUP BY (tb.cargo_type), tb.work_type, tb.container_size
